item.description:
Calling All Deliberate Creators,

Every day brings new adventures, and so I invite both returning and new comers to enhance your life using the Law of Attraction.

Our group will focus on:

Attracting Like Minded People

Manifesting your Desires in Life

Learning to Attract Health, Wealth, & Happiness

Learning the Power of Positive & Negative Thinking

Focusing on Positive Vibrational Alignment

I have been giving this opportunity by the Universe to be your Spiritual Leader, & I promise to go first in demonstrating Compassion, Understanding, Generosity, Kindness, Cheerfulness, Positivity, and Love.
This message was sent to me by Neale Donald Walsh. My goal is to bring in Positive Energy that uplifts our spirits which guides up to create a happier life

With Love Ellen
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the enclosed room in the back.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Deliberate Creators
